alert.note: Alert for Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 25 at 6:31PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm with very heavy rain will impact portions of west central Teller County through 700 PM MDT... At 630 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Cripple Creek, or 23 miles west of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Teller County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
